name: Five Nights At Obunga
description:
Note: This game is not meant to be taken seriously. I made this as a joke as well as to improve my programming skills.

You are a simple person looking for a job and went to work for a research facility named Mineral Research Facility. Unfortunately, you completely missed what they were housing inside: Copious numbers of nextbots.

Five Nights at Obunga is a non-profit parody off of Five Nights At Freddy's not made for any reason but to help me improve my programming skills. Go through five nights (really six but we don't talk about that) of defending yourself and the facility from the nextbots that wander it: Obunga and his crew.

This game was based off of and inspired by GMOD nextbot chases on Youtube, that being both the characters and how they act. Have fun!

I spent way too much time and effort making this game...

Music by: 

  • Kamil - Po twojej pysznej zupie
  • Makai Symphony - Dragon Castle
